TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SummaryLink extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A SummaryLink object that provides a way to store Web addresses.

remarks.para: A SummaryLink is an annotated hyperlink.
At minimum, a SummaryLink object contains a titleand a linkUrl. It also contains styling information that affects how it is rendered by the or .

example.code:
Imports System Imports System.Collections.Generic Imports System.Text Imports Microsoft.SharePoint Imports Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing Imports Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.Fields Imports Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.WebControls Imports SharePointWebParts = Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages Imports System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts
Namespace SummaryLinkFieldTest Friend NotInheritable Class CreateSummaryLinks ''' Creates SummaryLinks in a SummaryLinkField within a PublishingPage ''' This sample creates group headers and summary links within a SummaryLinkFieldValue object ''' and then applies the SummaryLinkFieldValue to a SummaryLinkField within a Page. ''' ''' Pre-requisite: ''' This sample assumes that 'Content Approval' is applied to ''' the Pages document library containing the PublishingPage. ''' <param name="publishingPage">The page in which to create the summary links</param> ''' <param name="fieldName">The name of the SummaryLinkField</param> Private Sub New() End Sub Public Shared Sub createFieldControlSummaryLinks(ByVal publishingPage As PublishingPage, ByVal fieldName As String) ' SummaryLinkFieldValue is the container for SummaryLinks and display configuration ' data. Dim summaryLinkValue As SummaryLinkFieldValue = CreateSummaryLinks.createSummaryLinkValue()
If publishingPage.ListItem.File.CheckOutStatus = SPFile.SPCheckOutStatus.None Then publishingPage.CheckOut() End If
' Replace the existing contents of the field with the newly created SummaryLinkValue publishingPage.ListItem(fieldName) = summaryLinkValue
publishingPage.Update() publishingPage.CheckIn("Checking in summary link change") publishingPage.ListItem.File.Publish("Publishing summary link change") publishingPage.ListItem.File.Approve("Approving summary link change") End Sub
''' Creates SummaryLinks in a SummaryLinkWebPart within a PublishingPage ''' This sample creates group headers and summary links within a SummaryLinkFieldValue object ''' and then applies the SummaryLinkFieldValue to a SummaryLinkWebPart on a PublishingPage. ''' ''' Pre-requisite: ''' This sample assumes that 'Content Approval' is applied to ''' the Pages document library containing the PublishingPage. ''' <param name="publishingPage">The page in which to create the summary links</param> ''' <param name="webRelativePageUrl">The web relative URL of the page</param> ''' <param name="webPartTitle">The Title of the web part</param> Public Shared Sub createWebPartSummaryLinks(ByVal publishingPage As PublishingPage, ByVal webRelativePageUrl As String, ByVal webPartTitle As String) Dim summaryLinkValue As SummaryLinkFieldValue = CreateSummaryLinks.createSummaryLinkValue()
If publishingPage.ListItem.File.CheckOutStatus = SPFile.SPCheckOutStatus.None Then publishingPage.CheckOut() End If
Dim webPartManager As SharePointWebParts.SPLimitedWebPartManager = publishingPage.ListItem.Web.GetLimitedWebPartManager(webRelativePageUrl, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared)
Dim webParts As SharePointWebParts.SPLimitedWebPartCollection = webPartManager.WebParts
For Each webPart As WebPart In webParts Dim slwp As SummaryLinkWebPart = TryCast(webPart, SummaryLinkWebPart) If slwp IsNot Nothing AndAlso String.CompareOrdinal(slwp.Title, webPartTitle) = 0 Then ' Replace the existing contents of the Web part with the newly created SummaryLinkValue slwp.SummaryLinkValue = summaryLinkValue webPartManager.SaveChanges(slwp) Exit For End If Next webPart
publishingPage.Update() publishingPage.CheckIn("Checking in summary link change") publishingPage.ListItem.File.Publish("Publishing summary link change") publishingPage.ListItem.File.Approve("Approving summary link change") End Sub
Public Shared Function createSummaryLinkValue() As SummaryLinkFieldValue Dim summaryLinkValue As New SummaryLinkFieldValue() summaryLinkValue.DisplayColumns = 2 summaryLinkValue.LinkStyle = "Bullets" summaryLinkValue.GroupStyle = "Black"
Dim summaryLinks As SummaryLinkCollection = summaryLinkValue.SummaryLinks
Dim summaryLink As SummaryLink
' Add Groups and links. ' The link style set here must correspond to one of the template names in the XSL Item style ' This is not verified by the OM, but an incorrect template name results in the ' link not rendering.
' GroupA
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("GroupA") summaryLink.IsGroupHeader = True
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link1") summaryLink.Description = "Description1" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link1"
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link2") summaryLink.Description = "Description2" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link2"
' GroupB
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("GroupB") summaryLink.IsGroupHeader = True
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link3") summaryLink.Description = "Description3" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link3" summaryLink.LinkToolTip = "Tooltip for link3"
Return summaryLinkValue End Function
End Class End Namespace

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string title) cil managed

Docs.summary: Constructs a new object with the specified title.

remarks.para: A SummaryLink object can either be created using this constructor, or by using the method. When a SummaryLink object is created independently of its collection, it should be added to the collection by using the SummaryLinkCollection.Add(SummaryLink) method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BeginColumn As Boolean
public: property bool BeginColumn { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets data indicating whether this object should begin in a new column.
Docs.value: Data indicating whether this SummaryLink object should begin in a new column.

remarks.para: The property indicates whether this SummaryLink object is the first link in a column. The XSL rendering template uses this property to determine whether to render a new column. This property is set when the method of the object is called before the links render or are saved.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets text that describes the object.
Docs.value: Text that describes the SummaryLink object.

remarks.para: The description text is free-form text that can be used to describe the purpose of the link. It is applicable to People links and Web page links. Before this value is set, the input is first stripped of leading and trailing whitespace. This value is available in the XSL rendering through the parameter.

Docs.exception: Invalid property value. The value cannot exceed 1000 characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Group { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Group : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the group to which this object belongs.
Docs.value: The name of the group to which this SummaryLink object belongs.

remarks.para: A SummaryLink object belongs to a group if it appears after a Group Header link within the object. The group that the link belongs to is determined by its order in the SummaryLinkCollection, not by setting this property.

This property indicates the group to which the link belongs and is intended mainly for XSL rendering by way of the parameter. The setter for this property is not intended for external use, and is used by internal serialization code that sets the value based on the nearest earlier group header link. If this value is set, it is recalculated when the SummaryLinkFieldValue is saved.
This value is available in the XSL rendering by way of the parameter.

Docs.exception: Invalid property value. The value cannot exceed 500 characters.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GroupStyle As String
public: property System::String ^ GroupStyle { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets template information about how to render the group that contains the object.
Docs.value: Template information for rendering the group containing the SummaryLink object.

remarks.para: This property determines which group style to use for this SummaryLink object.
This property is set when the method of the containing object is called before the links are rendered or saved.

example.code: Public Shared Function createSummaryLinkValue() As SummaryLinkFieldValue Dim summaryLinkValue As New SummaryLinkFieldValue() summaryLinkValue.DisplayColumns = 2 summaryLinkValue.LinkStyle = "Bullets" summaryLinkValue.GroupStyle = "Black" End Function

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ImageUrl : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL for the image associated with this object.
Docs.value: The URL for the image associated with this SummaryLink.

remarks.para: The ImageUrl property can be empty. If the ImageUrl property contains a string that is not empty, the string must be a URL that is either server-relative or fully qualified. Server-relative URLs start with a single backslash character. A fully qualified ImageUrl must have one of the following allowed protocols:

If the URL starts with "//" or "\\" it is considered to be a file: protocol and the beginning two slashes are replaced with file://. When setting the value, the input is first stripped of leading and trailing whitespace before being applied. If the absolute URL refers to an item in the current site collection, it is turned into a server-relative URL before being applied. This value is available in the XSL rendering through the parameter.

example.code:
' Add Groups and links. ' The link style set here must correspond to one of the template names in the XSL Item style ' This is not verified by the OM, but an incorrect template name results in the ' link not rendering.
' GroupA
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("GroupA") summaryLink.IsGroupHeader = True
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link1") summaryLink.Description = "Description1" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link1"
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link2") summaryLink.Description = "Description2" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link2"
' GroupB
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("GroupB") summaryLink.IsGroupHeader = True
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link3") summaryLink.Description = "Description3" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link3" summaryLink.LinkToolTip = "Tooltip for link3"
Return summaryLinkValue
example.para: Note: This code example is part of a larger code example in the topic.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ImageUrlAltText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ImageUrlAltText : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the text associated with the image URL for this object.
Docs.value: The text associated with the image URL for this SummaryLink object.

remarks.para: The alternate text can be used in HTML rendering as an attribute of a <SRC> tag that renders the ImageUrl property. This provides a tooltip in some browsers that describes the image. This value is available in the XSL rendering through the parameter. When setting the value, the input is first stripped of leading and trailing whitespace before being applied.
This property typically renders as the attribute on an tag.

Docs.exception: Invalid property value. The value cannot exceed 500 characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsGroupHeader { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsGroupHeader : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether this object is a group header that can be used to organize other SummaryLink objects.
Docs.value: A flag that determines whether or not this SummaryLink is a group header.

remarks.para: A group header link that represents a grouping for other links. It does not have a link URL property.

example.code:
' Add Groups and links. ' The link style set here must correspond to one of the template names in the XSL Item style ' This is not verified by the OM, but an incorrect template name results in the ' link not rendering.
' GroupA summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("GroupA") summaryLink.IsGroupHeader = True
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link1") summaryLink.Description = "Description1" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link1"
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link2") summaryLink.Description = "Description2" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link2"
' GroupB
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("GroupB") summaryLink.IsGroupHeader = True
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link3") summaryLink.Description = "Description3" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link3" summaryLink.LinkToolTip = "Tooltip for link3"
Return summaryLinkValue
example.para: Note: This code example is part of a larger code example in the topic.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsPeopleLink As Boolean
public: property bool IsPeopleLink { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets data that determines whether this object links to a person.
Docs.value: Data that determines whether this SummaryLink object links to a person.

remarks.para: This property indicates whether this is a People link. The presence of the property indicates a person.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ LinkToolTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.LinkToolTip : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a tool tip for the URL of the object.
Docs.value: The tool tip for the URL of the SummaryLink object.

remarks.para: This typically renders as a title attribute on an "A" tag.

Docs.exception: Invalid property value. The value cannot exceed 500 characters.

example.code:
' Add Groups and links. ' The link style set here must correspond to one of the template names in the XSL Item style ' This is not verified by the OM, but an incorrect template name results in the ' link not rendering.
' GroupA
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("GroupA") summaryLink.IsGroupHeader = True
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link1") summaryLink.Description = "Description1" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link1"
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link2") summaryLink.Description = "Description2" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link2"
' GroupB
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("GroupB") summaryLink.IsGroupHeader = True
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link3") summaryLink.Description = "Description3" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link3" summaryLink.LinkToolTip = "Tooltip for link3"
Return summaryLinkValue

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ LinkUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.LinkUrl : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the link item to which this object links.
Docs.value: URL of the link item to which this SummaryLink object links.

remarks.para: The LinkUrl property can be empty. If the LinkUrl property contains a string that is not empty, the string must be a URL that is either server-relative or fully qualified. Server-relative URLs start with a single backslash character. A fully qualified LinkUrl must have one of the following allowed protocols:

If the URL starts with "//" or "\\" it is considered to be a file: protocol and the beginning two slashes are replaced with file://. When setting the value, the input is first stripped of leading and trailing whitespace before being applied. If the absolute URL refers to an item in the current site collection, it is turned into a server-relative URL prior to being applied. This value is available in the XSL rendering through the parameter.

example.code:
' Add Groups and links. ' The link style set here must correspond to one of the template names in the XSL Item style ' This is not verified by the OM, but an incorrect template name results in the ' link not rendering.
' GroupA
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("GroupA") summaryLink.IsGroupHeader = True
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link1") summaryLink.Description = "Description1" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link1"
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link2") summaryLink.Description = "Description2" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link2"
' GroupB
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("GroupB") summaryLink.IsGroupHeader = True
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link3") summaryLink.Description = "Description3" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link3" summaryLink.LinkToolTip = "Tooltip for link3"
Return summaryLinkValue
example.para: Note: This code example is part of a larger code example in the topic.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ LoginName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.LoginName : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) address of the person who this object references.
Docs.value: The SIP address of the person whom this SummaryLink object references.

remarks.para: This property is only set if the SummaryLink object is a link to a person, otherwise it contains an empty string. The LoginName property is the key for the person, and is the data used to look up additional information about that person in the UserProfile object. This value is accessible in the XSL style sheets through the parameter.
This property only applies to SummaryLink objects that refer to people.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OpenInNewWindow { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.OpenInNewWindow : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether or not clicking this object opens its target in a new window.
Docs.value: Boolean value that indicates whether clicking this SummaryLink opens its target in a new window.

remarks.para: This value can be used to output HTML that ensures that the link either opens in the current window, or in a new window. This value is available in the XSL rendering through the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Order As Integer
public: property int Order { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the current position of the object in the collection.
Docs.value: The order of this SummaryLink in the SummaryLinkCollection.

remarks.para: When items are moved or deleted in the SummaryLinkCollection, their order properties are not immediately updated.
This property is used to identify a summary list link item that is being edited. It is set when the method of the object is called before the links are rendered or saved.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SipAddress { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SipAddress : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) address of the person whom this object references.
Docs.value: The SIP address of the person that this SummaryLink object references.

remarks.para: The SIP address of the person whom this SummaryLink references.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Style { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Style : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the style in which to render this object.
Docs.value: The style in which to render this SummaryLink object.

remarks.para: Summary Links are displayed through the SummaryLinkWebPart and SummaryLinkFieldControl objects. These controls have associated XSL style sheets that contain XSL templates that are used to render the links. The template that is applied for rendering this link is the template with a name matching this Style name. This value is available in the XSL rendering through the parameter.

example.code:
' Add Groups and links. ' The link style set here must correspond to one of the template names in the XSL Item style ' This is not verified by the OM, but an incorrect template name results in the ' link not rendering.
' GroupA
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("GroupA") summaryLink.IsGroupHeader = True
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link1") summaryLink.Description = "Description1" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link1"
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link2") summaryLink.Description = "Description2" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link2"
' GroupB
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("GroupB") summaryLink.IsGroupHeader = True
summaryLink = summaryLinks.Add("Link3") summaryLink.Description = "Description3" summaryLink.Style = "Default" summaryLink.ImageUrl = "http://www.live.com/live/1.100.7.337/img/wl_jewel.gif" summaryLink.LinkUrl = "http://www.example.com/link3" summaryLink.LinkToolTip = "Tooltip for link3"
Return summaryLinkValue
example.para: Note: This code example is part of a larger code example in the topic.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the title text of this object.
Docs.value: Title text of this SummaryLink object.

remarks.para: The title of a SummaryLink object identifies its link. Title applies to both People links and Web page links. For a People link, the title is set to the display name of the person. When setting the property value, the input is first stripped of leading and trailing white space before being applied. This value is accessible in the XSL style sheets through the parameter.

Docs.exception: Invalid property value. The value cannot exceed 500 characters.
